mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ropi.TEST_SUMMARY_TB( SYMBOL, COUNTRYCODE, SECTORCODE, INDUSTRYCODE, KONAME, ENNAME, CNNAME, KOSUMMARY, ENSUMMARY, CNSUMMARY, JPSUMMARY, TRADUNIT, NATIONCODE, NATIONKONAME, NATIONENNAME, NATIONCNNAME, NATIONJPNAME ) VALUES
(#{item.symbol}, #{item.countrycode}, #{item.sectorcode}, #{item.industrycode}, #{item.koname}, #{item.enname}, #{item.cnname}, #{item.kosummary}, #{item.ensummary}, #{item.cnsummary}, #{item.jpsummary}, #{item.tradunit}, #{item.nationcode}, #{item.nationkoname}, #{item.nationenname}, #{item.nationcnname}, #{item.nationjpname})
